c1.name: Splitting Gale
c1.effect: Fires 2 additional split arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.effect: Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s. Enemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES penalty when airborne.

c3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
c3.effect: Increases the level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
c5.effect: Increases the level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Storm of Defiance
c6.effect: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
